summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Sewer Utility; authorizing the replacement of existing combined sewers in Westlake Avenue North from Republican Street to Valley Street and in Mercer Street from 8th Avenue North to Westlake Avenue North, and authorizing the construction of a replacement sewer in Southwest Holly Street from 47th Avenue Southwest to 48th Avenue Southwest and connections to the existing sewers in 48th Avenue Southwest, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor.
